post.summary: This API facilitates fetching block allocation summary for a Hotel.
post.description:
This API will fetch Block allocation information for a hotel, and specified date range. The block allocated inventory, rates and room type statistics are returned as part of the response.

OperationId:startBlockAllocationSummaryProcess

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Request object for fetching block allocation summary asynchronously.

head.summary: This API returns the status of asynchronous process scheduled for given id.

Cache-Control.description: number of seconds to wait before polling again.

200.description: Response for status of scheduled asynchronous process.

Location.description: Location of newly created resource once the status of process run is Complete.

201.description: Response for status of scheduled asynchronous process.

get.summary: This API returns a hotel's block allocation summary for a scheduled process.
get.description:
This API will fetch Block allocation information for a hotel, and specified date range. The block allocated inventory, rates and room type statistics are returned as part of the response.

OperationId:getBlockAllocationSummary

200.description: Callback request object for fetched block allocation summary.

blockCode.description: Defined block code for the block.

hotelId.description: The Hotel Code the block belongs to.

createDateTime.description: The business date the block was created.

blockType.description: Indicates the internal type of the block like G, etc.

allocationDate.description: The block date for which the allocation details are listed.

inventory.description: The break up of projected rooms by occupancy.

rates.description: The break up of occupancy rates.

roomType.description: The room type for which the allocation details are listed.

originalRooms.description: The total original( forecasted ) rooms for the block.

currentRooms.description: The total current( projected + pickup ) rooms for the block.

pickupRooms.description: The total pickup rooms for the block.

blockGridInvType.description: Indicates the inventory values ( occupancy or availability ) per person occupancy.

fourPerson.description: Indicates the four person inventory value ( occupancy or availability ).

blockGridRatesType.description: Indicates the rate amount values per person occupancy.

onePerson.description: Indicates the one person occupancy rate amount.

twoPerson.description: Indicates the two person occupancy rate amount.

threePerson.description: Indicates the three person occupancy rate amount.

fourPerson.description: Indicates the four person occupancy rate amount.

extraPerson.description: Indicates the extra person occupancy rate amount.
